content:
potholder pattern is found within instructions for afghan blankets **note ** the pattern calls for 4-ply yarn and no yardage is given it s possible that fingering/4-ply weight was meant but given the hook size and gauge called for it seems unlikely the designer s other patterns often call for acrylic 4-ply knitting worsted weight please use your own best judgment when choosing a yarn
**sizes ** two baby sizes and one full size 32 x 32 inches 81 x 81 cm 32 x 48 inches 81 x 122 cm and 48 x 72 inches 122 x 183 cm
**materials ** 4-ply yarn * 8 10 28 oz color a * 8 10 28 oz color b * wooden crochet hook size 15 or 3/8 inch diameter or approx 9 5mm
